title: Alex Chalk – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alex Chalk, the Conservative MP for Cheltenham, on Twitter on 24 October 2022.
content:
I’m proud to be supporting Rishi Sunak today. I came into Parliament with him, and I know he has the brains, integrity, stamina and judgement to be our Prime Minister.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
